level.text: Fees shall be charged for professional corporations in the same amounts as for the equivalent services identified in ยง603.
In addition to the fees referenced in ยง 604.1, the following fees shall apply:
Articles of conversion pursuant to D.C. Official Code ยง 29-516 (2011 Repl.): two hundred twenty dollars ($220).

Source: Fiscal Year 2011 Budget Support Act of 2010, effective September 24, 2010 (D.C. Law 18-223), published at 57 DCR 6242, 6277 (July 23, 2010); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 59 DCR 8165, 8173 (July 6, 2012).
